name: Revolution Runner
description:
Welcome to the Endless Tunnel, where the goal is simple; watch the red ball fall and collect as many coins as possible!

Avoid the orange cubes while collecting the blue cones!

The base source code can be found here:

https://github.com/SymplGames/HMSource

I've made a lot of changes and improvements, but I'm going to clean the code a bit and document things a little better before I upload the new source.
